channel.title: Left Click not working.
channel.description:
My left click has suddenly stopped working. Im not sure when it happened, but I noticed it when turning on the fuel lines to activate the rocket.
Ive tried unplugging and plugging my mouse back in, restarting the game, loading up a different save. No idea how to fix this.

item.title: Left Click not working.
item.dc:creator: Splaterson
item.description:
Nevermind, I worked out what it was. The key mapping went weird and unmapped some of my keys.

Read full topic
